title: Google\Cloud\Talent\V4beta1\BatchDeleteJobsRequest
name: BatchDeleteJobsRequest
description:
Input only.

Batch delete jobs request.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.talent.v4beta1.BatchDeleteJobsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The resource name of the project under which the job is created. The format is "projects/{project_id}", for example, "projects/api-test-project".

params.name: data.filter
params.description: Required. The filter string specifies the jobs to be deleted. Supported operator: =, AND The fields eligible for filtering are: companyName (Required) requisitionId (Required) Sample Query: companyName = "projects/api-test-project/companies/123" AND requisitionId = "req-1"

methods.description:
